TopicTitle: Cant right click on parts on VAB/SPH

Articles.Content:
I fixed the issue, it was Editor Extensions Redux

I changed the game version from 1.12.3 to 1.10.1 since I was having problems with performance, and now I cant right click on parts, but only in VAB/SPH, works just fine in flight, and I dont really know what it could be

Here's what is in my gamedata folder:

In the console in the VAB there was a spam of something, If anybody needs I can send a screenshot, sorry that I didnt send a log, but I wanst able to find it

Edited October 14, 2022 by MrLivion

Did you change versions with mods installed? That is A Very Bad Idea as it can easily cause corruption of the game and/or mod files and cause strange issues. It’s better to create separate copies of KSP and then install mods in those copies.

What issues prompted you to change from 1.12.3 to 1.10.1? 

Guide to find logs:

On 10/11/2022 at 8:01 AM, jimmymcgoochie said:

Did you change versions with mods installed? That is A Very Bad Idea as it can easily cause corruption of the game and/or mod files and cause strange issues. It’s better to create separate copies of KSP and then install mods in those copies.

What issues prompted you to change from 1.12.3 to 1.10.1? 

Guide to find logs:

 

Sorry for the late reply but yeah I noticed now that doing this was a bad idea, but the issue itself was caused by (apparently) EditorExtensionsRedux, I didnt notice it was version specific

The reason I decided to change versions was because of performance issues, 1.12.3 is way too heavy and crashes a lot, in 1.10.1 performance is better so it should crash less, but 1.10.1 is still problematic since there is a annoying little thing that was fixed in 1.12+ which was a TLA_debug_stack_leak issue that I dont know how to fix, so I am stuck without playing ksp rn, all I know about this TLA thing is that gpu plays a big role in this

What I am going to try rn is removing all mods, backuping ny saves and just deleting everything in the KSP folder and telling steam to reinstall it
